com.socialize.ui.comment

Class CommentAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.socialize.ui.comment.CommentAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Adapter, ListAdapter, SpinnerAdapter

    public class CommentAdapter
extends BaseAdapter
    Provides comments to the comment view.
    Author:
    Jason Polites
